enhanced_by.reason: The account method provides the current state of the margin account, which is necessary to understand the available balance and assets before placing an OCO order.
Checking open orders helps ensure that there are no conflicting orders that might interfere with the new OCO order.
The getOcoOrder method retrieves details of a specific OCO order, which can be used to verify the correctness of the newly placed OCO order.
The getAllOcoOrders method retrieves all OCO orders, which can be used to verify the overall state of OCO orders after placing a new one.
